hero.description: I'm a Full-Stack Software Engineer Specializing in Documented Web and Application Development........

timeline.title: Bachelor's Degree
timeline.description: During my high school at I.E.M Emilio Cifuentes, I developed leadership and teamwork skills, which prepared me to tackle technical challenges and inspired me to start my career in software development.

timeline.title: Systems Technician
timeline.description: During my training as a Systems Technician at SENA, I gained key knowledge in web development with HTML and CSS, network infrastructure design, and IP addressing.

timeline.title: Diploma in Programming Skills with Emphasis on Web Applications
timeline.description: During my diploma in web programming skills at UNIVERSIDAD NACIONAL, I acquired knowledge in OOP, agile methodologies like SCRUM, and version control with Git. I participated in group projects applying best coding practices, using technologies such as Django REST, Node.js, Vue.js, PostgreSQL, Flask, Mongo, Spring Boot, and Angular, with 3-layer and microservices architectures.

timeline.title: Diploma in Data Analytics
timeline.description: During my data analytics diploma at PONTIFICIA UNIVERSIDAD JAVERIANA, I gained essential knowledge in data science using Python and its libraries. I learned to clean and prepare data, develop and train predictive models, and effectively visualize results, strengthening my ability to extract valuable insights and make data-driven decisions.

timeline.title: Programming Bootcamp
timeline.description: In the bootcamp with UNIVERSIDAD SERGIO ARBOLEDA, I acquired key skills such as teamwork, technical English, and agile methodologies. I strengthened my experience in Java with Spring Boot for the backend and Angular with TypeScript for the frontend, delivering a final product with a Mongo database. I also managed documentation, modeling, mockups, schedules, and user stories as the leader of our group, and participated in a hackathon where we secured second place.

timeline.title: Systems and Computer Engineering
timeline.description: I am currently in my eighth semester of Systems and Computer Engineering at University of Cundinamarca, where I have acquired theoretical knowledge in calculus, physics, and engineering-specific subjects. I have also developed skills in English, data structures, databases, cybersecurity, programming, research, documentation, modeling, and more.

contact.title: Contact
